'''Repaid in Full''' is [[Kinich]]'s [[Night Realm's Gift Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* When holding a Flamegranate via "Yumkasaur Mimesis," Kinich will consume [[Phlogiston]] at a rate of '''1.5''' per second. During this time, he is also considered to be in the [[Nightsoul's Blessing]] state.
